channel.title: Split Reality - The next level of RSPS - Custom items - Prestiging/Slayer Presti
channel.description:
FORUMS: www.splitreality317.com WEBSITE: www.split-reality.com
-PRESTIGE MODE IS NOW... INSANE. One you prestige, you will now earn a new Pet, New Whips, and now... NEW COMP CAPES. ** TITLES COME WITH EA LEVEL** -- PRESTIGE LEVEL ONE REWARDS New Pet Verac -- PRESTIGE LEVEL TWO REWARDS White Whip (Cosmetic) + Unlock Completionist Cape + Colors http://i.imgur.com/EIeIPfP.png -- PRESTIGE LEVEL THREE REWARDS Iron Whip + Yellow Completionist Cape (Better Stats) http://i.imgur.com/BtqGD9l.png -- PRESTIGE LEVEL FOUR REWARDS Steel Whip + Orange Completionist Cape (Better Stats) http://i.imgur.com/aYzci5s.png -- PRESTIGE LEVEL FIVE REWARDS Black Whip + Black & White Completionist Cape (Better Stats) http://i.imgur.com/FMam5tR.png -- PRESTIGE LEVEL SIX REWARDS Mithril Whip + Blue & White Completionist Cape (Better Stats) http://i.imgur.com/09nhWrX.png -- PRESTIGE LEVEL SEVEN REWARDS Adamant Whip + Purple & White Completionist Cape (Better Stats) http://i.imgur.com/gtfn32ns.jpg -- PRESTIGE LEVEL EIGHT REWARDS Rune Whip + Red & Green Completionist Cape (Better Stats) http://i.imgur.com/s50yMLP.png -- PRESTIGE LEVEL NINE REWARDS Dragon Whip + Purple & Black Completionist Cape (Better Stats) http://i.imgur.com/SRwEOlW.png -- PRESTIGE LEVEL TEN REWARDS Lava Whip (4x Faster Than Reg Whip) + Cyan & Black Completionist Cape **4x is Faster than Lime Whip (3x) -The "Well of Hope" has been added to the game. After putting in gold, you will receive 1 "Well Point" for each M gold you deposit. Use these points to activate either 1 hour of Double EXP or 20 Minutes of 3x EXP whenever you want! - The "Donate-to" option allows you to trade you coins for "Well Points". -The "Activate Bonus" option, allows you to enable you EXP bonuses. -The "Store-items in" option allows you to open your bank. - All pets in-game now have an "Open-Bank" option. (Anyone can bank off your pet as well!) -DRAGON DARTS ARE HERE!- -Dragon Darts can be made by using a chisel on Dragon Bones, and then using Feathers on them. - HIGHSCORES HAVE BEEN ADDED - By typing ::hs in-game, it will take you to the HighScores page. Here is where all your account's stats will be saved and ranked against other players. Type :Confusedavehs in game to update your profile, or when logging out it will be updated as well. - 200M CAPES ARE NOW AVAILABLE + MAC NPC - No it's not RS3, don't worry, but 200M capes are now out. After reaching 200M xp in any skill, talk to Mac to recieve your 200M cape. There will be a rope with a "Climb" option that will lead you to Mac that will be added today. https://i.gyazo.com/82c5c7b2a314f19eee82c62fa2d42c89.png https://i.gyazo.com/f1305cfd1dfadbbff52f0409dd5b693b.png https://i.gyazo.com/a6c0506f8b0329f3a50c26365a9a06e1.png https://i.gyazo.com/f00d36a27f3461d8e3608c9d1a78394e.png https://i.gyazo.com/1328a18cc59f7f9247e7fc54931d3c06.png https://i.gyazo.com/475bb842ecb205600f3dfef22de130cb.png https://i.gyazo.com/14bd62a00dfac68286bfc3d2eb72ac2d.png https://i.gyazo.com/b9b08634016bd0d7c217b0dd432360db.png https://i.gyazo.com/2b2187da1e54c4852926ec75dd3519f7.png https://i.gyazo.com/54a89e7f2f36a3c498c22e4cc9a34546.png https://i.gyazo.com/89a511fef76529df588538940fe64f5d.png https://i.gyazo.com/c2a689186d8508b0a6798393565afe4b.png https://i.gyazo.com/55096dddf71ec157e3c0390dc0cc9ab8.png https://i.gyazo.com/51214301fb8bb6a8a6250ed160948492.png https://i.gyazo.com/0424df5bd6d2a928a80cf69d840fe04b.png https://i.gyazo.com/a20114fc0795c4fc83f8357548498ba8.png https://i.gyazo.com/6353fced60623393b77e8b5439a4cfc0.png https://i.gyazo.com/77e000b37bd498e9f0d97caac5c17ca5.png https://i.gyazo.com/1326bf58e8ddf3ab73169b242b01a8e3.png https://i.gyazo.com/075d30a4abf5aa3a5dd48a1ea8521c43.png https://i.gyazo.com/4b9996485ec159fcf24aa00896f32a52.png - RECOLORED SLAYER HELMS - If you have played OSRS lately, you know that there are 3 new slayer helms. Black, Red, and Green. These have now been added in-game and can be obtainable through Slayer Prestiging. They have +1 to all stats over a normal slayer helm, as well as +2 Prayer. https://i.gyazo.com/d2d8879d4a1081a648dd411010ab2ed6.png https://i.gyazo.com/d60e349b7aa64ce40fa15d7afc49ebba.png https://i.gyazo.com/31c56234b62d505eef251b3200889489.png - PLATINUM TOKENS HAVE BEEN ADDED - Having max cash is always a problem, so use your coins on a bank and make them into Platinum Tokens. 1 Platinum Token = 1000 GP. https://i.gyazo.com/fa6986d49093a2bd471a4432e169ca37.gif

item.title: Split Reality - The next level of RSPS - Custom items - Prestiging/Slayer Presti
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

More media would be nice, some re-colors and skillcapes won’t provider much in-game content media.
I also think you copied and pasted this from somewhere, as you claim the media includes the different kinds of whips while they don’t. Possibly meaning this whole server is leeched. However i might take a look soon.

Read full topic
item.source: Split Reality - The next level of RSPS - Custom items - Prestiging/Slayer Presti

item.title: Split Reality - The next level of RSPS - Custom items - Prestiging/Slayer Presti
item.dc:creator: @splitreality splitreality
item.description:
@splitreality wrote:

FORUMS: www.splitreality317.com
WEBSITE: www.split-reality.com

-PRESTIGE MODE IS NOW… INSANE. One you prestige, you will now earn a new Pet, New Whips, and now… NEW COMP CAPES.
** TITLES COME WITH EA LEVEL**
– PRESTIGE LEVEL ONE REWARDS
New Pet Verac
– PRESTIGE LEVEL TWO REWARDS
White Whip (Cosmetic) + Unlock Completionist Cape + Colors

– PRESTIGE LEVEL THREE REWARDS
Iron Whip + Yellow Completionist Cape (Better Stats)

– PRESTIGE LEVEL FOUR REWARDS
Steel Whip + Orange Completionist Cape (Better Stats)

– PRESTIGE LEVEL FIVE REWARDS
Black Whip + Black & White Completionist Cape (Better Stats)

– PRESTIGE LEVEL SIX REWARDS
Mithril Whip + Blue & White Completionist Cape (Better Stats)

– PRESTIGE LEVEL SEVEN REWARDS
Adamant Whip + Purple & White Completionist Cape (Better Stats)

– PRESTIGE LEVEL EIGHT REWARDS
Rune Whip + Red & Green Completionist Cape (Better Stats)

– PRESTIGE LEVEL NINE REWARDS
Dragon Whip + Purple & Black Completionist Cape (Better Stats)

– PRESTIGE LEVEL TEN REWARDS
Lava Whip (4x Faster Than Reg Whip) + Cyan & Black Completionist Cape
**4x is Faster than Lime Whip (3x)
-The “Well of Hope” has been added to the game. After putting in gold, you will receive 1 “Well Point” for each M gold you deposit. Use these points to activate either 1 hour of Double EXP or 20 Minutes of 3x EXP whenever you want!

  • The “Donate-to” option allows you to trade you coins for “Well Points”.
    -The “Activate Bonus” option, allows you to enable you EXP bonuses.
    -The “Store-items in” option allows you to open your bank.
  • All pets in-game now have an “Open-Bank” option. (Anyone can bank off your pet as well!)
    -DRAGON DARTS ARE HERE!-
    -Dragon Darts can be made by using a chisel on Dragon Bones, and then using Feathers on them.
  • HIGHSCORES HAVE BEEN ADDED - By typing ::hs in-game, it will take you to the HighScores page. Here is where all your account’s stats will be saved and ranked against other players. Type :Confusedavehs in game to update your profile, or when logging out it will be updated as well.
  • 200M CAPES ARE NOW AVAILABLE + MAC NPC - No it’s not RS3, don’t worry, but 200M capes are now out. After reaching 200M xp in any skill, talk to Mac to recieve your 200M cape. There will be a rope with a “Climb” option that will lead you to Mac that will be added today.
    https://i.gyazo.com/82c5c7b2a314f19eee82c62fa2d42c89.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/f1305cfd1dfadbbff52f0409dd5b693b.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/a6c0506f8b0329f3a50c26365a9a06e1.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/f00d36a27f3461d8e3608c9d1a78394e.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/1328a18cc59f7f9247e7fc54931d3c06.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/475bb842ecb205600f3dfef22de130cb.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/14bd62a00dfac68286bfc3d2eb72ac2d.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/b9b08634016bd0d7c217b0dd432360db.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/2b2187da1e54c4852926ec75dd3519f7.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/54a89e7f2f36a3c498c22e4cc9a34546.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/89a511fef76529df588538940fe64f5d.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/c2a689186d8508b0a6798393565afe4b.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/55096dddf71ec157e3c0390dc0cc9ab8.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/51214301fb8bb6a8a6250ed160948492.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/0424df5bd6d2a928a80cf69d840fe04b.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/a20114fc0795c4fc83f8357548498ba8.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/6353fced60623393b77e8b5439a4cfc0.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/77e000b37bd498e9f0d97caac5c17ca5.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/1326bf58e8ddf3ab73169b242b01a8e3.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/075d30a4abf5aa3a5dd48a1ea8521c43.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/4b9996485ec159fcf24aa00896f32a52.png
  • RECOLORED SLAYER HELMS - If you have played OSRS lately, you know that there are 3 new slayer helms. Black, Red, and Green. These have now been added in-game and can be obtainable through Slayer Prestiging. They have +1 to all stats over a normal slayer helm, as well as +2 Prayer.
    https://i.gyazo.com/d2d8879d4a1081a648dd411010ab2ed6.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/d60e349b7aa64ce40fa15d7afc49ebba.png
    https://i.gyazo.com/31c56234b62d505eef251b3200889489.png
  • PLATINUM TOKENS HAVE BEEN ADDED - Having max cash is always a problem, so use your coins on a bank and make them into Platinum Tokens.
    1 Platinum Token = 1000 GP.
    https://i.gyazo.com/fa6986d49093a2bd471a4432e169ca37.gif

Read full topic
item.source: Split Reality - The next level of RSPS - Custom items - Prestiging/Slayer Presti
